title: Black beans
ingredients: ['400g dry black beans, soaked overnight', '1L cold water, or as needed', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '5 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '120ml white cooking wine', '60ml distilled white vinegar', '60ml olive oil']
